entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
